Get_all_orders_request: SELECT id, user_id, currency, side, price, amount FROM orders
Add_order_request: INSERT INTO orders (id, user_id, currency, side, price, amount) VALUES (%s, %s, %s, %s, %s, %s)
Edit_order_request: UPDATE orders SET id = %s, user_id = %s, currency = %s, side = %s, price = %s, amount = %s WHERE id = %s
